headline: Morgan Stanley Lifts Vistra (VST) Target on AI-Driven Power Demand Growth
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the 10 best AI stocks to buy according to billionaire David Tepper. On June 19, Morgan Stanley lifted its price target for Vistra stock to $186 from $178 while maintaining an “Overweight” rating. Analyst David Arcaro communicated this update. Arcaro cited three reasons for the update, with the primary […]

headline: Can Strategic Hedging Strengthen Vistra's Earnings and Growth Outlook?
summary: VST's robust hedging strategy boosts earnings visibility and fuels long-term growth.
